title: The leopard in the video was spotted on a road in Hyderabad, not on the Mumbai Express Highway
subtitle: The leopard in the video was spotted on a road in Hyderabad. On 14 May 2020, a leopard was seen resting on the underpass road at Mailardevpally in Hyderabad.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video of a leopard seen resting on a road is shared on social media claiming that the video was taken at Mumbai Express Highway. But FACTLY found that the leopard in the video was spotted on a road in Hyderabad. On 14 May 2020, a leopard was seen resting on the underpass road at Mailardevpally in Hyderabad.

Did you watch our new video?
